How do I install this game?

Okay peeps, this one works great with a little massaging. Here's what you do:
1) Download the torrent.
2) Inside is 4 small directories, one for each CD.
3) Using Daemon Tools (or whatever your choice happens to be), mount the .cue file from CD1. 
4) Install the game from the menu. Mount the .cue file from CD2, 3, and 4 when prompted for the "next cd".
5) Mount CD1 again to finish install.
6) Now here's the massaging part. You cannot run the game as is, it looks for a CD you don't actually have. Go visit Gamecopyworld or Gameburnworld, patch the game up to the latest version, and get the fixed No-CD file that corresponds to it. 
7) Replace the patched .exe game file with the No-CD one.
8) Play.

Hope that helps.
